text: Va khi mot phan tu trong bon chung lon tieng bao: “Nay hoi nguoi dan cua Yathrib (Al-Madinah)! Cac nguoi khong the cam cu noi (truoc suc tan cong cua đich). Boi the hay thao lui.” Va mot nhom nguoi cua bon chung đen xin phep Nabi thua: “Nha cua cua chung toi bo ngo”; trong luc that ra nha cua cua chung khong bo ngo nhung chung chi muon đao tau ay thoi
